title: 18th Century Venetian Villa Stay with Nightly Three-Course Dinners
description: Enter a world of traditional opulence, perfectly-manicured gardens and historic grandeur in the charming Treviso countryside - only 20 minutes’ drive from romantic Venice. Welcome to Villa Condulmer: A peaceful oasis for those who’d truly like to unwind amid the vibrant greenery of Mogliano Veneto and receive five-star, celebrity treatment along the way. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, nightly three-course dinner and a welcome glass of Italian prosecco on arrival.
offer_address: Via Preganziol, 1, 31021 Zerman, Mogliano Veneto TV, Italy

title: Stunning 18th-Century Venetian Villa Stay with Daily Breakfast and Dinner
description: Just 20 minutes from Venice, 18th-century splendour awaits at the five-star, historic Villa Condulmer, where you’ll stay in a traditional Venetian villa surrounded by a landscaped park and centred around a tranquil lake. Frequented by historic figures and celebrities such as Giuseppe Verdi, Ronald Reagan and Elizabeth Taylor, experience the Venetian hinterland with an automatic upgrade to a Junior Suite with lush garden views, a glass of Italian prosecco upon arrival, decadent daily breakfast and daily three-course dinner per person over four luxurious nights.
offer_address: Via Preganziol, 1, 31021 Zerman, Mogliano Veneto TV, Italy
